#summary The JCatapult Ant savant plugin

= Introduction =

This plugin provides other plugins the ability to use the Savant dependency management facilities. This plugin does provide a single target, but mainly is used to provide access to the Savant Ant extensions, which include all of the Ant Tasks and Types that come with Savant. 

Once this plugin is imported into a project, it is initialized and using the savantinit task. 

This plugin contains a single XML file that should be imported like this:

{{{
<import file="${ant.home}/plugins-jcatapult/savant/1.0/savant.xml"/>
}}}

= Targets =

The plugin provides these targets:

== deps-resolve ==

Performs a dependency resolution for all of the projects dependencies and transitive dependencies.
